name: Java HTML Web Page
summary: HTML file that includes Java code; similar to a standard .HTML file, but may include Java functions that are processed on the server before the page is sent to the client's Web browser; can also access information from a database using a JDBC (Java Database Connectivity) connection.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Edit and run with ATG Commerce software

linux.display_name: Edit and run with ATG Commerce software
